alert.note: Alert for Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:24PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coffee, northwestern Pierce, northern Atkinson, northwestern Ware, Bacon, northern Wayne, southern Jeff Davis and Appling Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 423 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Odum to 8 miles north of Willacoochee. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Jesup, Baxley, Alma, Pearson, Willacoochee, Broxton, Ambrose, Surrency and Nicholls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Appling; Atkinson; Bacon; Coffee; Jeff Davis; Northern Ware; Pierce; Wayne
